mapper.select: SELECT B.RESOURCE_ITEM_ID, B.OWNER_RESOURCE_ID, B.TARGET_RESOURCE_ID, B.ITEM_ID, T.ITEM_NAME, T.DESCRIPTION, B.ITEM_TYPE, RT.NAME AS TARGET_RESOURCE_NAME,B.OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER FROM SYS_RESOURCE_ITEM_B B LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_RESOURCE_TL RT ON (B.TARGET_RESOURCE_ID = RT.RESOURCE_ID AND RT.LANG = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_RESOURCE_ITEM_TL T ON (B.RESOURCE_ITEM_ID = T.RESOURCE_ITEM_ID AND T.LANG = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) WHERE B.OWNER_RESOURCE_ID = #{resourceId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ORDER BY B.ITEM_TYPE DESC

SELECT SRI.RESOURCE_ITEM_ID, SRI.ITEM_ID, SRF.RESOURCE_ID AS TARGET_RESOURCE_ID, RTL.NAME AS TARGET_RESOURCE_NAME, SRI.OWNER_RESOURCE_ID, SRIT.ITEM_NAME, SRIT.DESCRIPTION,SRI.OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER FROM SYS_RESOURCE_ITEM_B SRI, SYS_FUNCTION_RESOURCE SRF, SYS_RESOURCE_ITEM_TL SRIT, SYS_RESOURCE_TL RTL WHERE SRI.OWNER_RESOURCE_ID = SRF.RESOURCE_ID AND SRI.RESOURCE_ITEM_ID = SRIT.RESOURCE_ITEM_ID AND SRF.RESOURCE_ID = RTL.RESOURCE_ID AND RTL.LANG = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND SRIT.LANG = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND SRF.FUNCTION_ID = #{functionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ORDER BY SRI.RESOURCE_ITEM_ID
